zone.line: The aerial crimson falls, flushing her cheek--
So from our victim's destined agony
form
The shade which is our shape invests us round
Else are we shapeless as our Mother {N}ight
Prometheus
I laugh your power & his who sent you here
To lowest scorn.-- pour forth the cup of pain
1t Fury
thee
Thou thinkest we will rend you bone from bone?
And nerve from nerve, working like fire within?
Prometheus
Pain is my element as hate is thine
Ye rend me now, I care not--
2 Fury
Dost imagine
We will but laugh into your thy lidless eyes?
Prometheus
I weigh not what ye do, but what ye suffer
Being evil--cruel was the Power which called
You, or aught else so wretched, into light
